channel.title: [Help] Adding my music to my client? [Help]
channel.description:
can anyone msg me on msn or post an easy tut here on how to add music to my client? i want to realease it to my players for my big planned release of my next version and i got some music that would go perfect with it... so ya...
plz anyone???
my msn is drfeelgood3197@hotmail.com

item.title: [Help] Adding my music to my client? [Help]
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

oo, its a 508…

i dont think you can add music to a 508 client, or ive just never seen one. But 508’s doesnt have a JFrame with a music player, so im almost positive you can’t.

Read full topic
item.source: [Help] Adding my music to my client? [Help]

item.title: [Help] Adding my music to my client? [Help]
item.dc:creator: @shadowknight513 shadowknight513
item.description:
@shadowknight513 wrote:

i dont… is it possible to like add that to my 508 client?

Read full topic
item.source: [Help] Adding my music to my client? [Help]

item.title: [Help] Adding my music to my client? [Help]
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

If you have a Music option on your JFrame already then you should have a music folder in your client files.

just drag the songs you want into that folder.

Read full topic
